channel.title: Comments on: On Anger
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: 725176
item.description: A moment of pshychology: If you are hurt - the natural genetic and normal outcome is to feel anger. If not possible to express it (because it is against your boss for example) - leads to anger at self which becomes depression. So, the question is how to let yourself be angry without hurting yourself or others.
